data.name: Search and Rescue Demo
data.detailed_description:
Search & Rescue: Halny
DEMO VERSION
Please keep in mind the demo represents development stage and limited content.

Turn-based, strategy board game for up to 4 Players! Local or Remote, Co-Op or vs!
Search for Tourists lost in the Tatra Mountains during Extreme Halny Wind and bring everyone to safety!
Hurry up, it`s getting colder each minute!

Main Features
❆ 2 Modes: Save or Survive
❆ Story Missions
❆ Turn-based board game rules
❆ 1-4 Players
❆ Local or Remote Multiplayer
❆ Save & Survive modes - Rescue Tourists or Survive
❆ Main Board is based on Magnificient Tatra Mountains
❆ Random Map creator
❆ Learn about dangers of mountain environment and survival!
all of this is and more COMING SOON to STEAM



Did You know that Halny foehn wind can blow even 300km/h? It can lift You off the ground and throw down the slope!
Visibility is low, perceived temperature is low, snow, gravel or tree shards are flying around.
Check the weather and always be prepared for a hike in the mountains.

Search & Rescue is a game dedicated to all Volunteer Search & Rescue teams around the World, with special shout-out TOPR and GOPR! :)
